entries.name: Everfrost pickaxe
entries.hidden properties:
[IDENTIFY 13] On hit, activate to cause target to be frozen in ice. Target is grappled against the ice and must beat a 30 STR check to break free. Each STR check accumulates over multiple turns.
Each turn, the target takes 2 cold DMG.
If DMG is dealt against the target, it is instead dealt against the ice reduces the STR check needed respectively.
The ice is immune to cold DMG, and weak to fire DMG.
[INSPECTION 15 | IDENTIFY 13] If you listen closely, you can hear the constant whispering scream of a tortured portion of a soul: trapped in the everfrost.
entries.description: Wooden handled iron pickaxe. The head is frosted steel that is cold to the touch.

entries.name: Nolgre'eel's Iron fist (left)
entries.hidden properties:
[IDENTIFY 12] Item is cursed.
[EQUIPPED] +1 STR
[IDENTIFY 15]Whenever wearer deals DMG with a weapon, wearer is inflicted with 1 true DMG.
entries.properties: Herein lies the Iron Fists of Nolgre’eel, the Battlemage King. We welcome any who find them to wear them. We warn any who wear them to heed them: The left give strength to wield his sword, the right gives magic to spell his word. The left asks penance to chastise, the right makes fools of the wise.

entries.name: Nolgre'eel's Frozen Flame
entries.hidden properties:
[IDENTIFY 12] Item is cursed.
[IDENTIFY 14] Whenever the sword deals DMG, roll a d4: if 1, +1 cold DMG; if 2, +2 fire DMG; if 3, +1 cold DMG and +2 fire DMG; if 4, sword recharges by consuming your next 5 action points.
